amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for suicide prevention outreach for members of the military by $20 million and reduces funding for the Afghan Security Forces by $35 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 44 printed in the Congressional Record to strike $35,000,000 from the Afghanistan Security Forces Fund and apply $20,000,000 to the Defense Health Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
